requirements.description: A web-based scientific calculator implemented using basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing standard and scientific mathematical operations.

features.name: Basic Arithmetic Operations
features.description: Perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

features.name: Scientific Functions
features.description: Implement trigonometric functions (sin, cos, tan), inverse trigonometric functions, logarithmic functions (log, ln), exponential functions (e^x, 10^x), square root, power (x^y), factorial, and percentage.

features.name: Clear/Reset Functionality
features.description: Clear the current display and reset the calculator state.

features.name: Backspace Functionality
features.description: Delete the last entered digit or operation.

features.name: Display Input/Output
features.description: Show the current input and calculation results on the screen.

features.name: Sign Change (Positive/Negative)
features.description: Toggle the sign of the current number.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Display appropriate messages for invalid operations (e.g., division by zero, invalid input for scientific functions).

requirements.user_input: build a simple scientific calculator website using simple HTML, CSS and JavaScript
